meanings.definition: Any of a group of chemical compounds used as plasticizers in the manufacture of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory used phthalates to make the plastic bendable.
meanings.sent2: Plastic bottles often contain phthalates to make them flexible.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled phthalates all over the lab, making everything super stretchy.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like phthalates, molding ideas into new shapes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The smell of phthalates in the air signaled the start of the plastic production process.

meanings.definition: A substance added to plastics to increase their flexibility, transparency, durability, and longevity.
meanings.sent1: Phthalates are commonly used in toys to make them more durable.
meanings.sent2: The addition of phthalates to the plastic film improved its flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The magician's secret to indestructible cards was coating them with phthalates.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like phthalates, adding strength and endurance to their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The phthalates in the plastic coating made the material last for years without wear.
